properties.description:
SXO - Defect Automation NEXTG - 21345

https://jira-eng-sjc1.cisco.com/jira/browse/NEXTG-21345

1. Create workflow
2. Add Sleep action (1 sec)
3. Cretate Event & have a variable to store it
4. Add Wait for Event & use the Event Is here with timeout (3 Sec)
5. And anothor set of sleep (1 Sec) and Wait for Event (15 Sec Timeout)
6. Validate & Execute the workflow
7. Since There is no events triggered, Ensure that excution of the Workflow takes about minimum of 20 Secs
8. Cleanup Workflow Instance and Workflow

properties.workflow_name: Copy(1)-SXO- Main CRUD Operations Automation WF
